data.title: Love the environment
data.text: This place not only has great food and is decent priced for a steak house but the feeling in there is great.  Love the layout and old time feel plus it's not all fancy so you feel welcome!  Love this place

data.title: A Tired Restaurant
data.text:
My husband wanted a good steak dinner in Texas and our hotel gave us a 10% off coupon to eat here so we went to the edge of town for dinner. 

 It was late and I wasn't that hungry so I ordered from the $9.99 menu. The flavor was good but the breast was a small half portion, probably because of the price. It came with a baked potato and mushy mixed vegies served in a cup. The salad had just greens. When my meal was served  I added the shredded cheese and bacon bits to my salad.  My husband said his steak was ok. Nothing special. More mushy vegies. Each of our dinners was served with one hard onion ring. Disappointing after reading other reviews.

The place was tired, gloomy and rather dark, made more so by the old captain chairs and tables. Our server was pleasant. Would look for another place to eat next time in town.

data.title: Best place in town to eat!
data.text: This place was spoken very highly by the people we visited there as being the best steak house in town and it was. Everything there was great, the food and service were all amazing. Parking gets tight but inside it's decor is great and spacious. Must repeat the meal there.

data.title: Best STEAKS in Wichita Falls!!!
data.text: This is the BEST Steak place by far in Wichita Falls!!!! Their Luncheon Rib-eye meal is fantastic to the taste buds and the pocket book!!!!  Try it.....You WILL LOVE it!

data.title: Great Lunch place
data.text: While mother was building her home, we went to Wichita Falls from Vernon a lot. This was a great place to get a steak, salad and potato at lunch for a great price.  It was a great steak, beautiful place and a nice place to just take an hour break from the hustle bustle.

data.title: Just wow!
data.text: The food is so great, 3 different steaks and chicken were ordered at our table and all were awesome.  The baked potatoes were great but the German potatoes are out of this world!  The iced tea is really good. They add really nice touches to their plates.  We want to eat again there before we leave but won't have time.

data.title: Steaks
data.text: Great steaks. Great service. Steaks had great flavor and were cooked correctly. Awesome food. Would eat here again

data.title: Post Ride Dinner - great steak!
data.text: Our group had the cowboy cut ribeye and filets. The cut of beef was generous and prepared in a simple high flavor way. We all enjoyed it it. Sides were ok, but the main event was perfect. Would go back for sure!!

data.title: Great steak, good value
data.text: This is an annual stop for our group and this year did not disappoint.  We all had the Ribeye and they were cooked to perfection.  The baked potato was very good, the salad a little above average. It's hard to find a place that serves a steak this good for the price.  Our server was very good and kept up with our needs.  The cocktails were good too and they have a moderately priced wine selection.

data.title: Good Food, Pleasant atmosphere
data.text: Friendly staff, quick service.  We went in at 6PM on a Saturday night.  The waiting area was full, but we only waited about 15 minutes before being seated.  And, I noticed that all of those waiting people were seated within another 15 minutes.  That seemed more than acceptable in a place with no reservations.  The shrimp cocktail was delicious.  It's all in the sauce and theirs was terrific.  I had the filet mignon and I was a little disappointed.  The steak was tender and cooked to my order (medium), but I felt that the seasoning was a little bland.  My husband had a NY Strip and said it was great.  There were lots of non-steak choices on the menu.  The prices were what I'm used to where I live in the Midwest.

data.title: They know how to cook a steak
data.text:
This place has excellent cuts of meat and they know how to cook them.  I have often been to locations where they fail to cook the meat to their menu descriptions of rare, medium rare...well done.  

The atmosphere is pretty rustic, but the food is fantastic.  The prime rib was the best I've had in 4-5 years.  Cooked to perfection, served with raw horseradish... fantastic.

If I am back in the area - I will visit again.

data.title: Great steaks!
data.text: Want a great steak? This is the place to Go! Food was fast for a Steakhouse, service was friendly, food was good, as well as a great atmosphere!

data.title: I Love This Place!
data.text: McBride's is another staple of consistency in Wichita Falls.  While it is not the best steak I have ever had in my life....it is really, really good and it is the same every time I go.  You can't beat the ribeye. Their other steaks are great as ell, but the ribeye is the mother load.  Tons of flavor and just enough marbling to give it that great Texas flavor.

data.title: Great Service & Food
data.text:
Stopped in on my way back to Fort Worth. My husband loved his steak!
We have friends that live here and will be back in November.

data.title: Excellent Dinner With An Old Friend
data.text: We had dinner here on a Wednesday evening with few other diners present.  The staff was friendly and seemed pleased to see us.  All of us ordered steaks which were cooked to perfection and had a wonderful flavor.  I ordered the petite filet mignon with a baked sweet potato and tossed salad with bleu cheese dressing.  The meal was made even better by the presence of our long-time friend whom we had not seen in many years.  Should we be in the area again, we will definitely go back to this restaurant.

data.title: A Taste of Texas For A Very Reasonable Price
data.text: Ate at the McBride Land & Cattle Co. with two other adults and seven hungry Boy Scouts.  The service and food was excellent.  My only negative comment is that the breading for the frog legs was not seasoned enough for my palate.  My 10 oz. filet was cooked perfectly.  The mesquite flavors in the meat were genuine Texas.  Staff handled our large party with ease. Highly recommend.

data.title: Trip to Whiskeytaw Falls with old 350ml with bad shaft
data.text: Hard to say enough good things about this place. Outstanding food, service,decor, location, and so reasonably priced. Loved it and with be back every time in WF and hungry

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: While on vacation in Texas my grandson wanted a steak so the relatives took us here. There was 13 of us. Adults and children. The service was excellent as our waiter was knowledgeable, funny and efficient.  I had the catfish which was perfect. Many sides to choose from. Great place to eat!!!

data.title: Not a fan
data.text: I know a lot of people like this place because it's local, but for the price of the food I wouldn't say the quality is any better than Logan's or roadhouse, and they're cheaper.

data.title: Wonderful
data.text: We had been on the road for hours.  The desk clerk at our hotel suggested this restaurant.  Even though it was late and they were getting close to their closing time, we received excellent service and a great steak.  We would definitely visit again if we return to Wichita Falls.
